meta.title: Free Time Analyzer - Find Available Slots in Your Calendar
meta.description: Upload your ICS calendar file and instantly discover free time slots. Optimize your schedule and find perfect meeting times with our smart calendar analyzer.
meta.keywords: calendar analyzer, ICS parser, free time finder, schedule optimizer, meeting planner, time management, calendar gaps
